actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of benefits to a married couple on their combined earnings record where that method of computation produces a higher combined benefit.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, that the payment of benefits to a married couple shall be made on the basis of their combined earnings record where that method of computation produces a higher combined benefit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of benefits to a married couple on their combined earnings record where that method of computation produces a higher combined benefit.
